label: AB3C2_oC48_64_d_dg_ef-001
title: Experimental Li$_{3}$AlP$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
The first experimental information we have for this structure is from (Juza, 1952), who placed the system in space group $Ibca$ \#71 bu could not locate the lithium atoms, except to note that they are on a (16f) site. 
 (Dadsetani, 2011) used this work as the starting point for first-principles calculations to minimize the total energy of the structure, including the positions of the lithium atoms, keeping the structure in \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C2_oI96_73_f_3f_acde-001}{space group $Ibca$}.
 (Restle, 2020) used ball milling and annealing to produce samples of Li$_{3}$AlP$_{2}$ and Li$_{3}$GaP$_{2}$ and found them to be in \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C2_oC48_64_d_dg_ef-001}{space group $Cmce$ \#64}, shown here. While we believe that this work is correct, we present both structures.
